ComicInfo.Series: Kolchak: Tales of the Night Stalker
ComicInfo.Summary: "Proximity" part one of two. Curse of the mummy? Maybe... but this is no ordinary mummy. Just what makes the dried, hollowed corpse of Imjah Ra so different from the other crusty stiffs from ancient Egypt? That's what Kolchak would like to know... because this ancient evil is slowly draining his life force while he sleeps by feasting on his dreams! Kolchak discovers a local museum employee in the same predicament... but can the two of them together find a way to break the curse before they're driven insane?
ComicInfo.Title: Proximity
